    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getEngineURI()
      Returns the engine URI requested, or null if none supplied.
      java.lang.String getPassword()
      Returns the password or null if none supplied.
      java.net.InetAddress getRequestorAddress()
      Returns the requesting nodes's ip address obtained from InetAddress.getLocalHost().
      java.lang.String getUser()
      Returns the user name or null if none supplied.

        requestorAddress - the requestor host IP address
